solution_line_template: Michelle kept {sandwiches_given} sandwiches * {multiplier_for_herself} = <<{sandwiches_given}*{multiplier_for_herself}={sandwiches_kept}>>{sandwiches_kept} sandwiches for herself.

This leaves {total_sandwiches} total sandwiches – {sandwiches_given} sandwiches for a coworker – {sandwiches_kept} sandwiches for herself = <<{total_sandwiches}-{sandwiches_given}-{sandwiches_kept}={sandwiches_left}>>{sandwiches_left} sandwiches for her other co-workers.
